text: Immanuel Maurice Wallerstein (;"China and the World System since 1945" by Immanuel Wallerstein September 28, 1930 - August 31, 2019) https://www.poliscirumors.com/topic/immanuel-wallerstein-died was an American sociologist, economic historian and world-systems analyst.
